summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Washington Heights Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue and 37th Avenue, from 37th Avenue to East Marion Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 119457 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
